email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

I hope this message finds you well.

We have the MV SEA HORIZON (DWT: 180,000, LOA: 290m) available for your iron ore shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao. The cargo size is 170,000MT on CIF terms. Our starting freight quote is USD 18.50 per ton. Laycan is 1-5 Dec. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Maria Gonzalez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Thanks for the offer. USD 18.50 seems a bit high compared to the current market. Can you do better? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Alex Lee
Global Chartering

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

I can offer USD 18.00 per ton. Demurrage rate is USD 25,000 per day. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

USD 18.00 is better. Can we push it to USD 17.75? Also, can we adjust the laycan to 2-6 Dec?

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

USD 17.75 is possible. Laycan adjusted to 2-6 Dec. Please confirm.

Best regards,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Confirmed. Please send the summary of terms.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Here's the summary:
- Vessel: MV SEA HORIZON
- Cargo: 170,000MT Iron Ore
- Load Port: Port Hedland
- Discharge Port: Qingdao
- Laycan: 2-6 Dec
- Freight: USD 17.75 per ton
- Demurrage: USD 25,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm.

Best regards,
Maria
